title: Torment card
data:
{{Version030}}
{{flavour|The card depicts a screaming figure being tortured on the rack.}}
The Torment Card invokes [[torment]] against the player. If the player is [[undead]] or a [[Demonspawn]], it will invoke [[holy word]] instead. Either way, your HP will be halved.
